id:
Beyonce Was Toni Braxton For Halloween, Continuing Her Tradition Of Celebrating Black Women Music Icons
        Latest from As/Is
paragraph:
"Sending love and adoration to one of our talented legends."
        ICYWW here are just a ~few~ of Toni's receipts: eight studio albums (including a TON of platinum and gold certifications worldwide); six compilation albums; 30 singles (again, a TON of platinum and gold certifications), 22 music videos, three Broadway appearances (she was the first and only Black performer to play Belle in Disney's Beauty and the Beast), seven Grammys, seven American Music awards, five Billboard Music awards, and four Soul Train Music awards. I meannnn, she's contributed so much to music and has been nominated for so many awards that she's got separate Wikipedia pages for both.Shout out to Twitter user @ShayLanise for the tip!!!Phoni Braxton!? NEVER!!!
How do you look better than me on MY album cover? 
I LOVE IT, Such a superstar! 
Thanks for the love sis! 
Happy Halloween 🎃 
Who run the world...GIRLS! GIRLS! 💃🏽💃🏼
@Beyonce https://t.co/dFSbBrQV8YBeyoncé was Lil Kim last year & Toni Braxton this year. We love a LEGEND that shines light on the legacy of other legendary black women.Great!
        
          As/Is will be hitting your inbox soon!
        
      Great!
        
          As/Is will be hitting your inbox soon!
